com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.controller

Class SBTaxesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.controller.SBTaxesController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SBWebsitesAndMessages

    @Controller
public class SBTaxesController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SBWebsitesAndMessages
    Version:
    2.0

    User: jstachera

    Date: 02.01.2018

    Controller class with methods that support '/taxes/**' links directly.

    Author:
    Justyna Stachera.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SBTaxesController

        @Autowired
public SBTaxesController(SBUserDao userDao,
                                     SBTaxDao taxDao,
                                     SBTaxCustomDao taxCustomDao,
                                     SBTaxValidator taxValidator)
        An argument constructor autowired interfaces extending JpaRepository and Validator objects.
        Parameters:
        userDao - It provides methods related with 'sbuser' table from database.
        taxDao - It provides methods related with 'sbtax' table from database.
        taxCustomDao - It provides extra methods related with 'sbtax' table from database.
        taxValidator - It validates SBTax object fields.

        @RequestMapping(value="/taxes/selectAll",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView taxesSelectAllGet(@ModelAttribute(value="taxField")
                                                                                                                                              SBField taxField,
                                                                                                                                              @ModelAttribute(value="taxId")
                                                                                                                                              SBId taxId,
                                                                                                                                              @ModelAttribute(value="chosenEnum")
                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String chosenEnum,
                                                                                                                                              @ModelAttribute(value="taxAddInfo")
                                                                                                                                              SBField addInfo,
                                                                                                                                              @ModelAttribute(value="taxModifyInfo")
                                                                                                                                              SBField modifyInfo,
                                                                                                                                              @ModelAttribute(value="taxRemoveInfo")
                                                                                                                                              SBField removeInfo,
                                                                                                                                              @ModelAttribute(value="isTaxUserIdInvalid")
                                                                                                                                              SBBoolean isTaxUserIdInvalid,
                                                                                                                                              org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView modelAndView)
        A method is used to show a tax list, sort it and find record by tax ID.
        Parameters:
        taxField - An chosen field from a sort bar.
        taxId - An ID value chosen field.
        chosenEnum - It informs in which column the table has to be sorted.
        addInfo - A message about adding a new record to database.
        modifyInfo - A message about modification a record in database.
        removeInfo - A message about deleting record from database.
        isTaxUserIdInvalid - It checks if user ID is invalid.
        modelAndView - It contains all models and a logical view name.
        Returns:
        A ModelAndView interface implementation.
